text: [Music]
hi friends I am Niharika and welcome
back to a new lesson today we are going
to learn different ways to say quit okay
now what is quit well firstly quit is a
verb and what it means well it means to
stop doing an action or to stop a
process now you know there are so many
moms who tell their children quit doing
that so what the mean is to stop doing
what the children are doing okay so this
is what quit means and we are going to
look at five different ways which means
to quit okay so the first one that we
have for you is to give up now to give
up means to stop doing something the
thing of the thing that you did in the
past and now you don't for example I
used to smoke and now I don't so this
means I have quit smoking but a better
way to say that you can say I have given
up smoking okay so which definitely
means that you have stopped or you have
quit smoking okay so it means when you
stop doing something is to give up okay
the next one that we have is to ditch
now to ditch means to abandon something
or someone
now her boyfriend ditched her for a new
girl so this means that he has ditched
her he has abandoned her he has quit
dating her okay maybe he is definitely
cheated on her for a new girl so they
are no more dating okay so they have
quit the boy has quit dating her so you
can use the better phrase now remember
ditch is more of a slang okay and which
means to abandon right the next one that
I have for you is come to a standstill
now what does this mean this means to
come to complete stop okay
like for example the traffic came to a
standstill okay maybe there was too much
of crowd too many cars and it was a
bumper-to-bumper traffic so the traffic
came to a standstill
this means the cars were not moving they
quit moving okay the bus came to a
standstill
so again which means it quit moving
maybe it was not working okay maybe it
had some problem so it came to a
complete standstill or maybe it got
stuck in the traffic okay so that's
another way that you can use to talk
about quitting or stopping okay then we
have to discontinue now to discontinue
is a very formal word okay which of
course means to stop it's a formal word
you know when you say that the company
has discontinued to import the car part
okay so this means they have stopped
doing that
so maybe the process of importing the
parts the car parts is being
okay they have quit doing that the car
model is discontinued okay when you go
to buy a new car and maybe the company
doesn't make that car anymore they would
always say in a very formal manner I'm
sorry ma'am we have discontinued that
model okay the cars model so which means
they have stopped they have quit making
that car model okay so this is the way
you can use the word to discontinue in a
very formal manner okay then the last
one that we have for you is to seize and
of course to seize means to come to the
stop okay to quit okay it is very very
famous
in the news media whenever you read the
newspaper or you listen to the news they
would never say that the war has stopped
the war has come to a stop they would
always use the word seeds they would say
the war has ceased this means the war
has stopped okay
so again it's a very formal word to say
stop or quit okay so these are certain
words that would help you in your daily
conversation but you are talking about
quitting or stopping some action or a
process that brings me to the end of
this lesson hope these words would be
helpful for you the next time you are
talking about quitting or stopping
something
please don't quit watching our windows
and do take a test I'll be back with a
new lesson till then you take care
[Music]
